title: Davon's Amulet Store.

properties.name: description
properties.value: Davon's Amulet Store is a jewellery store in Brimhaven, owned by Davon. It stocks enchanted gem amulets, as well as holy symbols. It has a higher buying price and lower selling price to players wearing Karamja gloves 1 or higher.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Davon's Amulet StoreThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Davon's Amulet Store
Davon's Amulet Store.
Released27 February 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationBrimhaven
OwnerDavon
SpecialtyAmulet shop
Location

Davon's Amulet Store is a jewellery store in Brimhaven, owned by Davon. It stocks enchanted gem amulets, as well as holy symbols. It has a higher buying price and lower selling price to players wearing Karamja gloves 1 or higher.

The shop has no inventory of its own to sell, making it useful for getting rid of enchanted amulets as it will buy them for a higher price than other shops. Ironmen cannot buy from this shop because it will always be overstocked.
